DOC.brief_summary: Many plasma donation center Tetanus immunization program implement order collect plasma high level tetanus antibody . The immunization program require participant receive multiple tetanus vaccination period time goal hyper-immunizing tetanus . Their antibody-rich plasma use manufacture tetanus immunoglobulin product help prophylaxis treatment tetanus disease . The Tetanus vaccine previously use program longer manufacture . Therefore , must evaluate safety efficacy different vaccine use purpose . The FDA approve Tetanus vaccine currently available adult US combination vaccine also immunize Diphtheria and/or Pertussis . In study , investigator evaluate two vaccine combination Tetanus Diphtheria ( Td ) . Investigators evaluate vaccine contain Pertussis antigen . The vaccine evaluate manufactured MassBiologics Sanofi Pasteur ( Tenivac ) . The package insert vaccine indicate administer previously vaccinate people every 10 year . However , study evaluate whether safe effective dosing every 90 day . The investigator hypothesize least 25 % study subject positive response least one five plan dos . Each vaccine evaluate separately .
